title: 7: SCORPIOS ARE BATSHIT
description:
In this solo episode, Sofia takes her listeners into the chaotic place that is her mind and updates them on her current situation. She also discusses some new shit which is astrology! In a rather offensive way but also in a she had a psychotic Scorpio stalker way! Last but not least she gives us some hot tips on something we all need during quarantine: how to spice things up in the bedroom. Sometimes a girl just needs her alone time with her sloots!

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
